archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.1.15: The information security status of external suppliers should be assessed on a regular basis, using a consistent and approved methodology (e.g. based on an industry standard) to ensure:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
